mapper.insert: insert into orders (orderID, carID, cuID, postPName, postPTel, postPAddr, getPName, getPTel, getPAddr, goodsName, goodsWeight, orderType, orderState, transportPrice, deliveryPrice, totalPrice, Comment) values (#{orderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cuID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postPName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postPTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postPAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getPName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getPTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getPAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update orders set carID = #{carID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cuID = #{cuID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postPName = #{postPName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postPTel = #{postPTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postPAddr = #{postPAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPName = #{getPName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPTel = #{getPTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPAddr = #{getPAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsName = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsWeight = #{goodsWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderType = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderState = #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transportPrice = #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deliveryPrice = #{deliveryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalPrice = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where orderID = #{orderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select orderID, carID, cuID, postPName, postPTel, postPAddr, getPName, getPTel, getPAddr, goodsName, goodsWeight, orderType, orderState, transportPrice, deliveryPrice, totalPrice, Comment from orders where orderID = #{orderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
